## IReceivedJoinRequest interface

A request to join a conversation made by a user. The existance of an instance implies that the request is pending and that the acting user is eligible to accept or ignore it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IReceivedJoinRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [conversationId](./core-conversations.ireceivedjoinrequest.conversationid.md) | <code>ConversationId</code> | The ID of the conversation the user requests to join. |
|  [id](./core-conversations.ireceivedjoinrequest.id.md) | <code>JoinRequestId</code> | Uniquely identifies a conversation join request. |
|  [requestedAt](./core-conversations.ireceivedjoinrequest.requestedat.md) | <code>Timestamp</code> | The point in time the user requested to join the conversation. |
|  [userId](./core-conversations.ireceivedjoinrequest.userid.md) | <code>UserId</code> | The ID of the user that is requesting to join the conversation. |
